org.numenta.nupic.network

Class NetworkTestHarness

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.network.NetworkTestHarness

  • public class NetworkTestHarness
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates setup methods which are shared among various tests in the org.numenta.nupic.network package.
    Author:
    cogmission

    • Method Detail

      • setupMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> setupMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> map,
                                                                                                        int n,
                                                                                                        int w,
                                                                                                        double min,
                                                                                                        double max,
                                                                                                        double radius,
                                                                                                        double resolution,
                                                                                                        java.lang.Boolean periodic,
                                                                                                        java.lang.Boolean clip,
                                                                                                        java.lang.Boolean forced,
                                                                                                        java.lang.String fieldName,
                                                                                                        java.lang.String fieldType,
                                                                                                        java.lang.String encoderType)
        Sets up an Encoder Mapping of configurable values.
        Parameters:
        map - if called more than once to set up encoders for more than one field, this should be the map itself returned from the first call to #setupMap(Map, int, int, double, double, double, double, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean, String, String, String)
        n - the total number of bits in the output encoding
        w - the number of bits to use in the representation
        min - the minimum value (if known i.e. for the ScalarEncoder)
        max - the maximum value (if known i.e. for the ScalarEncoder)
        radius - see Encoder
        resolution - see Encoder
        periodic - such as hours of the day or days of the week, which repeat in cycles
        clip - whether the outliers should be clipped to the min and max values
        forced - use the implied or explicitly stated ratio of w to n bits rather than the "suggested" number
        fieldName - the name of the encoded field
        fieldType - the data type of the field
        encoderType - the Camel case class name minus the .class suffix
        Returns:
